adjectives.description: apostematous (comparative more apostematous, superlative most apostematous)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to an aposteme; having the nature of an aposteme; characterised by apostemes.
examples: But I suspect they are rarely applicable to any other than the apostematous phthisis.  […]  Patients labouring under severe apostematous consumption, have often derived signal advantage from living solely on milk.
